metadata.title: Bibliography of the current world literature

abstract.original_text: going to press. The bibliography has been grouped into topics that relate to the reviews in this issue.

sentences.segment_text: The bibliography has been grouped into topics that relate to the reviews in this issue .

abstract.original_text: • Papers considered by the reviewers to be of special interest. oo Papers considered by the reviewers to be of outstanding interest.

abstract.original_text: The number in square brackets following a selected paper, e.g. [7], refers to its number in the annotated references of the corresponding review.
